description: Try our easy to follow Blueberry & Yoghurt Swirl Popsicles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Ice blocks,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Blueberry,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Blueberry & Yoghurt Swirl Popsicles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place blueberries and honey in a food processor and pulse until smooth.
Place yoghurt and milk in a medium mixing bowl and stir to combine. Add blueberry pur√©e to yoghurt mixture and, using a large spoon, gently swirl to create a marbled effect.
Pour mixture into popsicle moulds and insert popsicle sticks into the centre of each.
Freeze for 4 hours or until completely frozen.
